tool_description: Pimcore API for headless product information management (PIM/MDM)
name: Pimcore

api_list.name: Pimcore
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pimcore.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pimcore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://pimcore.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pimcore.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
